source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video is a wide scenery shot of a Japanese street corner. Initially, a red taxi is in the center middle ground, driving from right to left on a road that occupies the lower half of the frame. A dark pole stands in the left foreground. In the background, a green hedge lines the road, with a mix of traditional and modern buildings and trees behind it. The camera pans left, following the red taxi as it moves to the left side of the frame, which brings a black car and a white car into view in the middle ground. The camera then tilts upward, causing the street to move to the bottom of the frame and bringing a large blue overhead road sign into the center. The final shot frames the sign in the upper half, with the tops of the background buildings below it and a cloudy blue sky filling the top. The camera is positioned at eye level.
